title: Club Tags, How?

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/Zzxqkds.png

^ Click

Then click the + near the club name ( You need to be the owner and have at least 5 members besides yourself)

Create your tag, you won't be able to use Esport team names, Riot or things people have already used.

Enjoy. :)
Unless they changed it recently it's not, I made two clubs (Using two accounts) and both needed 5 other people.

>besides yourself

I thought it was including yourself.
Yeah I thought so too at first...
